equipmentCatalog.title: Equipment for digital food production

equipmentCatalog.markingStationsDesc: Automatic product marking with weight control, label printing and Honest Sign code validation.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Unfortunately, the requested page does not exist or has been moved.

honestMark.heroDesc: We implement Honest Sign as a managed IT project: 1C/EDI/equipment/processes + demo result as a "control panel".
honestMark.processStep0: At the production stage, each product receives a unique Data Matrix code that is created and applied to the packaging.
honestMark.processStep1: During logistics, the code is tracked as the product moves from manufacturer to warehouse and then to point of sale.
honestMark.processStep2: At sale, the code is scanned at the checkout, the product is withdrawn from circulation, and the information is transmitted to the Honest Sign system.
honestMark.datamatrixHint: Enter product/batch — the "code" is generated and displayed as a matrix. Click "Scan" for validation.
honestMark.validDesc: Code is valid. Status: "In circulation". No errors detected.
honestMark.demoNote: * Demo simulation for the site. In a real project, an industrial generator/scanner is connected.
honestMark.simulatorHint: Drag products between stages and click "Scan". This shows where errors and risks most often occur.
honestMark.simulatorTip: Tip: looks like a product scenario, not a "text page".
honestMark.scanOk: Scan OK: code confirmed and recorded in the chain.
honestMark.compareHint: Drag the slider — see how risk, team load and launch speed change.
honestMark.casesNote: * Typical metrics (depend on category, logistics and 1C/EDI version).
honestMark.eventsDesc: In a real integration, this would show batch statuses, receipt/shipment, returns, UPD errors and duplicate codes.
honestMark.benefitsSubtitle: Marking as a process management tool
honestMark.servicesSubtitle: We implement marking and IT infrastructure: fast, secure, with support
honestMark.compareLeft1: Longer timelines due to trial and error
honestMark.compareLeft2: High risk of errors in EDI/1C/checkouts
honestMark.compareLeft3: No unified scheme for putting into circulation
honestMark.compareLeft4: Difficult to debug returns and misgrades
honestMark.case1Title: Retail (footwear): from manual control to automation
honestMark.case2Title: Wholesale (FMCG): stable document flow + transparent statuses
honestMark.case2Before1: Chain breakdown due to incorrect UPD
honestMark.case2Before2: Hard to find "where the code was lost"
honestMark.alert2Title: OFD did not confirm withdrawal from circulation
